addStream.streamLink.help: The "Stream Link" is different for each stream type.{newline}{newline}For Facebook, it must be PUBLIC. It is the URL when you click "share" or "copy link" (e.x. "https://fb.watch/eyTrWLFDxu").{newline}{newline}For YouTube, the stream must be PUBLIC and you need to allow "video embedding". It is the livestream/video ID (i.e. "6mnMw_jKbxw" if the video URL is "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6mnMw_jKbxw").{newline}{newline}For Twitch, it is your channel name / ID.
auth.method.signupWithPhoneTerms: By verifying your phone number, you are agreeing to our {termsOfService}.
auth.password.passwordLength: Password must be at least {minLength} characters
auth.password.passwordMustContainNumber: Password must contain at least one number
auth.resetPassword.emailSuccess: A password reset email was sent to your email! Check your spam folder.
battlePage.noStreamsMessage: Tournament does not have any streams. Ask the Tournament host to add some.
battlePage.seemsLikeThisTournamentDoesNo: Seems like this tournament does not have any Lootbox Tickets yet
battlePage.streamText.switchStreamText: You are watching "{streamName}". To switch to another stream, {clickHereHyperlink}
battlePage.streamText.switchStreamText.n: You are not watching a stream. To choose a stream, {clickHereHyperlink}
bounty.myNFTs.title: Your NFTs
bounty.myNFTs.tooltip: These are the NFTs your wallet {walletAddress} owns from this lootbox {lootboxAddress}.
bounty.redeem.bountyValueTooltip: The NFT you redeem has the chance of earning "{bountyValue}" according to the Party Basket issuer. There is no guarantee of a profit and please contact the Party Basket issuer if you have questions.
bounty.redeem.bountyValueTooltipNoValue: The Party Basket issuer has not stated a maximum earnings value for this NFT. Please contact the Party Basket issuer if you have questions.
bounty.redeem.checkForBountiesText: Check for Redeemable NFTs using your MetaMask Wallet!
bounty.redeem.noBountiesText: You do not have any NFTs to redeem. Please check again later.
bounty.redeem.noNFTsToRedeem.text: You have no NFTs to redeem
bounty.redeem.partyBasketTooltip: You can redeem FREE profit sharing NFTs if the Party Basket issuer has permitted you to do so. If you believe you are entitled to redeem an NFT, please contact the Party Basket issuer.
bounty.redeem.promptText: You have a free NFT available to redeem. Click the button üëá to redeem!
bounty.redeem.redeemFromLootbox.text: Redeem a FREE Profit Sharing NFT from the Lootbox "{lootboxName}"
bounty.redeem.title: Redeem Free NFT
bulkReferral.campaignName.title: Campaign Name
bulkReferral.numReferrals.title: Number of Links to Generate
bulkReferral.referrer.title: Referrer ID
buyShares.disclaimer: * Lootbox takes a {feeText} of investments into a Lootbox. You are spending {tokenQuantityText} for {sharesText} of this Lootbox. You will also be charged a native gas fee for this transaction which Lootbox does not control or receive. The holder of this NFT is entitled to {lootboxPercentageText} deposited by the issuer. This is calculated as {sharesText} out of {maxSharesText} available. This {lootboxPercentageValue}% may be different, depending on the final amount of shares sold at the end of the Fundraising period. There is no guarantee of a return, consult your financial advisor before investing.
buyShares.header.title: Mint your Profit Sharing NFT
create.lootbox.step.funding.helpTextMess: We cannot guarantee you will be able to fundraise your target amount. Maximize your chances by watching videos on our YouTube channel teaching best practices on how to fundraise.
create.lootbox.step.funding.helpTextTitl: 3. How much money do you need?
create.lootbox.step.funding.subheading: We recommend you start with a small amount that is easy to deliver a profit on. You can make unlimited Lootboxes for anything you want.
create.lootbox.step.fundraising.receivin: This address will receive the money right away. We highly recommend you use a MultiSig wallet if you are a team. Our YouTube channel has tutorials on how to set up a MultiSig.
create.lootbox.step.network.heading: 1. Choose your Network
create.lootbox.step.network.heading.help: The network you choose should be the same blockchain as the game you intend to play. You may bridge money across chains after funding, if needed.
create.lootbox.step.network.subheading: Your Investors will send you money in the native token. Profits can be shared as any ERC20 token on that blockchain.
create.lootbox.step.type.heading: 2. Choose Lootbox Type
create.lootbox.step.type.heading.help: Choose a Lootbox type based on your use case. Read the descriptions of each type to find which is right for you.
create.lootbox.step.type.subheading: Use the default option ‚ÄúEscrow‚Äù if you don‚Äôt know which to pick.
createLootbox.customizeTicket.inputBiogr: Write a 3-5 sentence introduction of yourself and what you plan to use the investment money for.
The name of your Lootbox. It can be your name, your mission, or just something catchy. Keep in mind that you will likely have multiple Lootboxes in the future, so try to have a uniquely identifyable name to reduce confusion.
createLootbox.customizeTicket.inputSymbo: Set a shortname for your NFT Tickets to be displayed in Metamask. Max 9 characters.
createLootbox.customizeTicket.subHeading: Finally, an NFT that's actually useful üòÇ
Your Lootbox fundraises money by selling NFT tickets to investors, who enjoy profit sharing when you deposit earnings back into the Lootbox.
createLootbox.customizeTicket.title: 5. Customize NFT Ticket
createLootbox.networkMismatch: MetaMask is on the wrong network
createLootbox.receivingWalletError: Invalid Receiving Wallet, check if the address is compatible with {networkName}.
createLootbox.rewardSponsors.erc20.amoun: Enter the amount of ERC20 Token you'd like to transfer. This number is expressed in the tokens decimals, so 1 USDX = 18 decimals while 1 USDY may be 6 decimals. You can verify the decimals by viewing the contract on a Block Explorer. If you do not understand what this means, please refer to the EVM documentation. Note that your Metamask wallet also shows units in the tokens decimals, so you can use the same units in your wallet.
createLootbox.rewardSponsors.erc20.tip: Enter the contract address of the ERC20 Token you'd like to transfer. You can get the official contract address by finding it on CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko. Deposits in ERC20 reqiure a two step process of first approving the amount, and then the actual transfer.
createLootbox.rewardSponsors.native.tip: Reward your sponsors with the same native token originally used to fund your Lootbox. In this case it would be {networkSymbol} on {networkName}. It is totally up to you which method you use to reward sponsors. ERC20 tokens are also supported.
createLootbox.step.socials.heading: 6. Contact Information
createLootbox.step.socials.subheading: Email is mandatory. Twitter is important for easy public communication with your investors. We also highly recommend you film a 1 minute self-introduction YouTube video and paste the link here (it helps build trust).
createLootbox.step.socials.tooltip: Having public profiles is important for building trust with investors.
createLootbox.step.terms.createLootboxMe: Do not refresh this page. Submission usually takes less than 3 minutes. Please be patient, sometimes the blockchain is slow!
createLootbox.step.terms.reputationWalle: Your wallet address has an on-chain reputation based on how consistently you pay back profits to investors. A good reputation helps future fundraising, and even allows you to sponsor a friend.
createLootbox.step.terms.title: 7. Terms & Conditions
This wallet address is where the funds from your Lootbox will be deposited. Double check that this address is correct.
createLootbox.stepChooseFunding.fundrais: We recommend you set a fundraising target slightly higher than what you need in case of fluctuations in the value of the native token. You will receive the money right away, regardless of whether you hit your fundraising target.
createLootbox.stepChooseFunding.invalidF: Fundraising target must be greater than zero
createLootbox.stepChooseFunding.maxFundr: We recommend you set a maximum fundraising target slightly higher than what you need in case of fluctuations in the value of the native token. You will receive the money right away, regardless of whether you hit your fundraising target.
createLootbox.stepChooseNetwork.noAccoun: Please connect your wallet by clicking the red button "Connect" above ‚òùÔ∏è
createLootbox.stepChooseReturns.paybackD: Target payback date must be in the future
createLootbox.stepChooseReturns.paybackP: This is shown to investors as an end date they should expect to receive their profits. You can reward investors any time, this payout date is just an estimate. Be honest and realistic with your estimate.
createLootbox.stepChooseReturns.returnTa: This target is shown to investors but is not a guranteed return. You decide how much this is, based on your knowlege of the oppourtunity you are pursuing. A 10% target return on 10 ETH investment means you intend to reward investors 11 ETH. Typically your obligation to reward investors ends when you hit your target return.
Target return must be greater than zero
createLootbox.stepChooseReturns.subtitle: Lootbox is not a loan. You decide when and how much you want to reward your investors. Good performance improves your on-chain reputation, helping you fundraise more in the future.
createLootbox.stepChooseReturns.title: 4. How will your reward your investors?
createLootbox.stepChooseReturns.tooltip: Treat your investors like your fans. The more you reward them, the more they will trust and support you.
createLootbox.stepChooseType.escrow.bio: Use this if you have a target amount to fundraise. You can only access the money if you hit your target goal.
createLootbox.stepChooseType.escrow.help: An Escrow Lootbox is best when you need a minimum amount of funds ready before you start playing.
createLootbox.stepChooseType.instant.bio: Use this if you want to instantly get the money and continue fundraising while you play.
createLootbox.stepChooseType.instant.hel: An Instant Lootbox is best for when you do not know how much money you need, and the requirements may change as you play.
Use this if you want to participate in an ESports Tournament with a set buy-in. Acts like Escrow.
ESports Tournaments have set buy-in price, such as $10 per player. Use a Tournament Lootbox to fundraise your buy-in and share profits with your sponsors.
createLootbox.stepCustomize.biography.er: Biography must be at least 12 characters
createLootbox.stepCustomize.themeColor.e: Theme color must be a valid hex color
createLootbox.stepMagicLink.campaignWebs: Website in the Lootbox social links is set
createLootbox.stepMagicLink.generateMagi: Copy the link above ‚òùÔ∏è and send it to the person you want to create a Lootbox for.
Easily allow anyone to create a Lootbox according to the settings you choose.
Create a magic link and share it with your community. Magic links easily allow anyone to create a Lootbox according to the settings you choose.
createLootbox.stepMagicLink.tournamentId: This Lootbox is associated to a Tournament.
fundraisingBar.help.template: This is the target funding goal of the gamer.
generic.connectWalletToMetamask: Please connect your wallet with MetaMask
generic.name: Name
generic.pleaseInstallMetamaskChromeExten: Please install MetaMask to use this app. Use the Chrome extension or Metamask mobile app.
generic.searchLootboxesByNameOrAddress: Search Lootboxes by Name or Address
generic.title: Title
generic.wrongNetworkPleaseChangeTo: You are on the wrong network! Please change your MetaMask network to
generics.includeCountryCode: Phone number needs a country code (eg. +63 or +1)
generics.loginToMakePartyBasket: Login to make a Party Basket
generics.maximumNumberOfClaims.descripti: A claim is a right to receive a free Lootbox NFT. When the number of completed claims exceeds this number, the Party Basket status will automatically switch to Sold Out.
generics.partyBasketInformation: We recommend you use a Party Basket to bulk mint NFTs to your fanbase. Party baskets allow you to whitelist bounty pick-ups in batch, which means you don't need to send the NFTs manually. Instead, your fanbase can redeem the bounties themselves.
inviteLink.modal.description: You‚Äôll BOTH get extra free Lootbox Tickets for each person invited
inviteLink.modal.description.postCosmic: You‚Äôll BOTH get extra free Lootbox Tickets for each person invited
inviteLink.modal.success.description: Copy the link and share it with your friends.
inviteLink.modal.success.description.pos: Copy the link and share it with your friends.
inviteLink.modal.success.screenshotHeade: Screenshot the QRCode and Share with Friends
Screenshot the QRCode and Share with Friends
lootbox.manage.advanced.tooltip: This Lootbox management page handles 90% of use cases. If you need access to the full Lootbox controls, you will need to import this contract into OpenZeppelin Defender and interact with the blockchain directly. The most likely reason why you would need to use Advanced Controls is if you accidentally trap tokens in your Lootbox and need to rescue them (tokens get trapped if you just send them to the Lootbox address directly. always use the UI to reward sponsors instead of sending tokens directly. trapped tokens can be rescued easily but its a hassle). A full tutorial on Advanced Controls can be found on the LootboxFund YouTube Channel.
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.caution: Be careful not to mint too many NFTs, as the profit share amount will get smaller
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.enterAmountOfNFT: Enter a number of NFTs to mint
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.enterAmountOfNat: Enter an amount of native token to deposit
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.notUsingPartyBas: You are not using a Party Basket
This is where all the NFTs will be sent to. You can set it to a Metamask wallet and manually send NFTs to fans. Or set it to a smart contract that will allow fans to redeem their gifted NFT themselves (saving you time & gas fees).
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.rewardSponsors.i: Supercharge your fanbase by gifting them your Lootbox NFTs. This is a great way to incentivize engagement from your community by rewarding them a share of your gamer earnings. Only available for Lootbox Exclusive Partners.
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.rewardSponsors.t: If you would like access to this Bulk Mint feature, email us at support@lootbox.fund
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.sendAllNFTsToPar: Send all NFTs to this address
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.totalNFTs.toolti: The total number of NFTs to mint. Each NFT will end up receiving an equal portion of the total amount spent. For example, if you spend 1 BNB and set the quantity to 5, then you'll mint 5 NFTs with 0.2 BNB spent on each.
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.totalSpend.toolt: The total amount of native tokens you want to spend on bulk minting these NFTs. Each NFT will end up receiving an equal portion of the total amount spent. For example, if you spend 1 BNB and set the quantity to 5, then you'll mint 5 NFTs with 0.2 BNB spent on each. The last NFT may receive unnoticeably more or less due to tiny rounding.
lootbox.manage.bulkMint.usingPartyBasket: {icon} You are bulk minting to a party basket {icon} Party baskets allow you to whitelist bounty pick-ups in batch, which means you don't need to send the NFTs manually. Instead, your fanbase can redeem the bounties themselves.
lootbox.manage.controlPanel.description: It is made for the Lootbox creator but anyone can use it. Watch this Youtube Tutorial to learn how.
lootbox.manage.controlPanel.title: This is the public control panel for Lootbox
lootbox.manage.createLootbox.description: Publish your Lootbox to {networkName}. You cannot change your funding goal after publishing.
lootbox.manage.createLootboxTooltip: You've already completed this step if you're on this Manage Lootbox page. If you want to create another, click the button below or visit https://lootbox.fund/create
lootbox.manage.finishFund.description: Only collect the money if the funding target is hit. Otherwise refund the sponsors.
lootbox.manage.finishFund.tooltip: In an Escrow Lootbox, you may only collect your fundraised amounts if the target funding is hit. You may exceed the target funding, but only up to the max amount of shares available for sale. Click the "End Fundraising" button will send the funds to your receiving wallet. If you can't hit your funding goal, you may refund sponsors, which simply deposits the funds back into the Lootbox for sponsors to redeem (the funds will not automatically be sent to their wallet, you must tell them to redeem it by email or social media). Only the issuer of the Lootbox can offer a refund, but after 30 days anyone can force a refund if the target has not been hit. If you created an Instant Lootbox instead, then the funds get instantly sent to your receiving wallet and there is no refund (you would need to manually deposit funds back). Before you can deposit funds back, you need to end the fundraising.
lootbox.manage.fundingGoalTooltip: This Lootbox has a goal of selling {numShares} shares for a target value of approx {sharesValue} equal to ${usdValue} at todays prices. The max amount of shares for sale is {maxShares}
lootbox.manage.fundraisingPeriodSuccessf: Fundraising period successfully ended. You may now reward sponsors.
lootbox.manage.lootboxAddress.tooltip: Every Lootbox has its own smart contract address. This Lootbox is on {networkName} with contract address {lootboxAddress}. You can verify all details you see on this UI by viewing it on a Block Explorer.
lootbox.manage.lootboxTitleTooltip: This is the human-friendly name of the Lootbox, but the real name is its contract address {lootboxAddress}. When sponsors buy from this Lootbox and receive it in their wallet, it will have the symbol {lootboxSymbol} with 0 decimals. If sponsors want to transfer their NFT to another wallet, they will need to use OpenZeppelin Defender as Metamask does not support all ERC721 transfers. The tutorial for this can be found on the LootboxFund YouTube channel.
lootbox.manage.lootboxType.title: Lootbox Type
lootbox.manage.lootboxType.tooltip: There are two types of Lootboxes, Escrow & Instant. Most Lootboxes are Escrow type, which means it has a target fundraising amount and the funds can only be accessed when that target is hit, otherwise the money is refunded back to sponsors. In comparison, an Instant Lootbox will transfer raised funds immediately to the receiving wallet without waiting, and refunds must be done manually by the issuer of the Lootbox (the reputation address). For more info, check out the LootboxFund YouTube channel.
lootbox.manage.payoutsMade.title: Deposits Made
lootbox.manage.payoutsMade.tooltip: The number of times a deposit was put into this Lootbox. Each deposit is a payout reward for sponsors to redeem. Only sponsors who own an NFT ticket from this Lootbox can redeem their proportinal share of deposited rewards. Anyone can deposit into a Lootbox. If you would like to see the total number of unique addresses who deposited into this Lootbox, import this contract into OpenZeppelin Defender (Advanced Settings). A full tutorial can be found on the LootboxFund YouTube Channel.
lootbox.manage.playAndEarn.description: Play the crypto games you fundraised for. Update your sponsors with news if any. Tag @LootboxFund
lootbox.manage.playAndEarn.title: Play & earn
lootbox.manage.playAndEarn.tooltip: Now that you've received the funds, you can go play and earn. It is good practice to update your sponsors on social media so that they know what you are doing with the money, and so that other people can see you as a professional. Make sure you also include #LootboxFund or tag us, so that people can understand what is going on. If they do not understand its a Lootbox, you will miss out on future potential sponsors.
lootbox.manage.promote.description: Start sharing your Lootbox on social media for sponsors to buy NFTs. Watch the YouTube Tutorial.
lootbox.manage.promote.title: Actively promoting
lootbox.manage.promote.tooltip: There is no such thing as free money. If you want sponsors, you need to earn their trust and recognition by promoting your Lootbox on social media. If you want to learn how to do proper fundraising, watch our Bootcamp Series on the LootboxFund YouTube channel.
lootbox.manage.reputationAddress.tooltip: This is the address that will receive recognition for this Lootbox's performance. If this Lootbox provides a good return on investment for sponsors, this reputatioin address will be associated with that good on-chain performance. Likewise, this wallet will be associated with bad performance if this Lootbox does poorly. But don't worry too much about bad performance, as its more important that there is ample history of Lootboxes created by this reputation address. Owning an address with a good reputation is a valuable asset that will help you in future fundraising. However, sponsors should not rely solely on on-chain performance history, as anyone can just send funds to their own Lootbox to make it look like good performance. Always check their social media (off-chain reputation) as well to get the full picture.
lootbox.manage.rewardSponsors.descriptio: Share your crypto earnings with sponsors. Anyone can deposit earnings.
lootbox.manage.rewardSponsors.lootboxAdd: Every Lootbox has its own smart contract address. This Lootbox is on {networkName} with contract address {lootboxAddress}. You can verify all details you see on this UI by viewing it on a Block Explorer.
lootbox.manage.rewardSponsors.pickReward: Anyone can deposit rewards into your Lootbox. You can choose to deposit native tokens or any ERC20 token.
lootbox.manage.rewardSponsors.reputation: This is the address that will receive recognition for this Lootbox's performance. If this Lootbox provides a good return on investment for sponsors, this reputatioin address will be associated with that good on-chain performance. Likewise, this wallet will be associated with bad performance if this Lootbox does poorly. But don't worry too much about bad performance, as its more important that there is ample history of Lootboxes created by this reputation address. Owning an address with a good reputation is a valuable asset that will help you in future fundraising. However, sponsors should not rely solely on on-chain performance history, as anyone can just send funds to their own Lootbox to make it look like good performance. Always check their social media (off-chain reputation) as well to get the full picture.
lootbox.manage.rewardSponsors.subheading: Reward your sponsors by depositing native or ERC20 tokens back into this Lootbox. Rewards can only be redeemed if they own an NFT ticket minted from your Lootbox.
lootbox.manage.rewardSponsors.tooltip1: If you have earned a profit, you can reward your sponsors by depositing earnings back into your Lootbox for sponsors to redeem. Anyone can deposit into your Lootbox, which allows a friend or stranger to assist you too. Make sure you make a social media post about it so that sponsors and strangers can see your success. This will help you in future fundraising. Be sure to use #LootboxFund or tag us, so that they are not confused and understand what is going on.
lootbox.manage.rewardSponsors.tooltip2: Reward your sponsors by depositing native or ERC20 tokens back into this Lootbox. Deposited amounts can be redeemed by all sponsors who own an NFT ticket purchased from your Lootbox. Each NFT ticket will redeem its proportioal share of earnings based on its number of shares purchased vs total shares sold.
lootbox.manage.slowNetworkMessage: Loading data from Blockchain. This may take up to 1 minute... if taking too long, please refresh the page. In most cases, it's the blockchain network being slow.
lootbox.manage.ticketsMinted.title: Sold NFT Tickets
lootbox.manage.ticketsMinted.tooltip: The number of NFT tickets sold by this Lootbox. One sponsor may own multiple NFT tickets and they may be traded to new owners. Each NFT ticket may contain a different number of shares. If you would like to see the total number of unique sponsors owned by this Lootbox, import this contract into OpenZeppelin Defender (Advanced Settings). A full tutorial can be found on the LootboxFund YouTube Channel.
lootbox.manage.totalFunded.title: Total Funded
lootbox.manage.totalFunded.tooltip: This Lootbox has a goal of selling {targetAmountShares} shares purchased in {networkSymbol}. So far, {fundedAmountShares} shares have been sold. The max amount of shares for sale is {maxAmountShares}.
lootbox.manage.treasuryAddress.tooltip: The receiving wallet is where the funds raised by this Lootbox will go. This may be the original issuer's wallet, or it may be an ESports Tournament Wallet, or another smart contract destination. Make sure that the receiving wallet matches what you expected/intended. Anyone can create a Lootbox and style it to look like any other Lootbox, so always check that the receiving wallet is correct.
lootbox.manage.versionSemver.tooltip: This is the version of the LootboxFund smart contract which you can use to determine its features available. The Lootbox team is continously improving this technology and future Lootboxes will have a different version number. While future Lootbox versions are not guaranteed to be backwards compatible, you can always access past Lootboxes as we freeze the cloud infrastructure that provides this UI. Furthermore, if this UI ever becomes unavailable, you can always use OpenZeppelin Defender to interact with the smart contract directly as it is forever available on the blockchain.
lootbox.manage.viewPartyBaskets.clickToV: Party Baskets allow your community to redeem NFT bounties on their own, so you don't need to send it to them! You can bulk whitelist addresses for a Party Basket by clicking here.
lootbox.manage.viewPartyBaskets.partyBas: This is an advanced feature. We recommend watching the tutorial video about it by {href}.

These are your Party Baskets for this Lootbox. Party Baskets hold onto Lootbox NFTs and allow you to "whitelist" specific wallets, giving them special permission to redeem one of the NFTs from the Party Basket for free.
If you would like access to this Party Basket feature, email us at support@lootbox.fund
lootbox.manage.viewPartyBaskets.youDoNot: You do not have any Party Baskets
lootbox.wtf.bro: {targetAmountNumber} {symbol} is the target funding goal of this lootbox. The maximum capacity of this lootbox is {maxAmount} {symbol}. So far, this lootbox has raised {percentageFunded}% of its funding goal.
partyBasket.create.form.disclaimer.text: You are creating a Party Basket on the blockchain. Use Party Baskets to hold onto your bulk minted NFTs which you can then give away for free or for completing bounties.
partyBasket.create.form.disclaimer.title: {icon} IMPORTANT {icon} Please Read
partyBasket.create.form.enterPartyBasket: Please enter a name for your party basket
partyBasket.create.form.name.title: Party basket name
partyBasket.create.form.prize.title: NFT prize value
partyBasket.create.form.prize.tooltip: You determine how much each NFT bounty will be worth. You can specify crypto currencies like "10 Matic" or fiat like "$10 USD"
partyBasket.create.form.socialLink.title: Add a link to your community
partyBasket.create.form.socialLink.toolt: Direct users to your community by adding a link to your community page.
partyBasket.manage.authWhitelistClaims.d: Clicking this will automatically whitelist all users with a completed Claim. The user must have attached a metamask wallet to their account for it to work. Clicking this button multiple times is SAFE and will not duplicate whitelists.
partyBasket.manage.bulkWhitelisting.desc: Whitelisting is a feature that allows give away an NFT for free. The address you specify will be able to redeem this ONE TIME, and your Lootbox Bounty NFT will be transfered to them when they redeem it.

Upload a ".csv" file of addresses to whitelist. {csvRequirementText}. These addresses will get whitelisted which will allow each address to pick up their own NFT (without requiring you to send it to them). Whitelisting an addThis will allow yWhitelisting is a feature that allows give away an NFT for free. The address you specify will be able to redeem this ONE TIME, and your Lootbox Bounty NFT will be transfered to them when they redeem it.
partyBasket.manage.bulkWhitelisting.head: Bulk Whitelist Address
partyBasket.manage.bulkWhitelistingDescr: Bulk whitelisting will grant a large number of wallets a free NFT to redeem. You can use a CSV file (like {hyperlink}), and then you can upload it by clicking the button below. Your Party Basket will need to have Lootbox NFTs in it (by bulk minting) in order for your followers to be able to redeem one.
partyBasket.manage.csvRequirement: The CSV file needs a column titled "{csvKey}".
partyBasket.manage.details.address.descr: This is the address of the Party Basket. It is a smart contract on the blockchain.
partyBasket.manage.helpTooltip: This is your Party Basket for "{lootboxName}". You can bulk mint NFTs to this contract address, and then bulk whitelist people (with a CSV upload) to pick them up for FREE (AKA: Redeem a bounty)!
partyBasket.manage.input.communityUrl.de: URL of the community to join. Users will be directed to this link after accepting the lottery ticket.
partyBasket.manage.input.name: Party Basket Name
partyBasket.manage.input.status.descript: Active:{newline}{newline} - party basket is browseable in the tournament pages{newline} - party basket is in the viral referral program{newline}{newline} Disabled:{newline}{newline} - removes party basket from tournament pages{newline} - removes from viral referral flow{newline}{newline} Sold out:{newline}{newline} - removes from viral referral flow - party basket still visible on tournament pages
partyBasket.manage.missingAddressColumnE: No "{csvKey}" column found in uploaded CSV. Please fix your csv file by adding a column named "{csvKey}" with the desired addresses you want to whitelist & re-upload.
Partial Errors with Submission. Please re-whitelist the rows specified below
partyBasket.manage.partyBasketDescriptio: This is your Party Basket for "{lootboxName}". Party Baskets hold onto Lootbox NFTs and allow you to "whitelist" specific wallets, giving them special permission to redeem an NFT from the Party Basket for free.
partyBasket.manage.viewWhitelistedWallet: Download a .csv file that contains a list of all the whitelisted addresses for this Party Box.
profile.lootboxes.noLootboxes: Already made one? Then you need to add your wallet ‚òùÔ∏è Otherwise, you can {createLootboxHyperLink}.
profile.lootboxes.title: My Lootboxes
profile.onboarding.title: You're almost set up...
profile.onboarding.verifyEmailText: You should have received an email from us. {checkSpamFolderText}{newlineCharacter}Can't find it? {resendVerificationEmail}
profile.public.aboutMe: Follow tournament organizers on social media to be updated on when you can redeem your lottery tickets if you win.
profile.public.userLotteryTicketsTip: Your list of Lootbox Tickets are only claims - these are unverified tickets. The tournament host is responsible for verification and they have the final say on winners. Ask your tournament host for their list of verified tickets.
profile.settings.changePassword.title: Add a Password
profile.settings.newPasswordSuccess: Password was added to your account.
profile.settings.noEmailFoundForUser: No email found for this user
profile.settings.passwordResetEmailSent: A password reset email was sent to your email.
profile.settings.title: Account Settings
profile.socials.mySocialsDescription: It is important you add these details so that tournament organizers can notify you if you‚Äôve won prize money.
profile.tournament.noTournaments: You can create a Tournament for a professional esports tournaments, a live stream battle chest or if you just want to dual your friends.
profile.wallets.help: Wallets are used as an alternative login to your account. They also help us find your data like your Lootboxes. You need to have installed MetaMask to use this feature.
profile.wallets.helpText: Wallets are used to sign into your account. We also use them to find your Lootboxes. Try adding a MetaMask wallet, and use it to login.
profile.wallets.pleaseInstallMetamask: Your MetaMask wallet is used as your web3 identity. You will need one to interact with the blockchain. You can {downloadMetamaskLink}.
quickCreateLootbox.singleStep.heading: Join Lootbox Tournament
quickCreateLootbox.singleStep.headingToo: Quickly create a Lootbox by joining a tournament with its predefined settings.
quickCreateLootbox.singleStep.socials.to: Provide your teams social media so that tournament organizers and fans can contact or follow you.
quickCreateLootbox.singleStep.subheading: Quickly join a Tournament using its predefined settings and your customized artwork for your Lootbox.
signatures.loginMessage: Welcome! Sign this message to login to Lootbox. This doesn't cost you anything and is free of any gas fees.
signatures.whitelistMessage: Sign this message to see if you can redeem a FREE NFT from Lootbox! This doesn't cost you anything and is free of any gas fees.

step.magicLink.disclaimer.heading: You are using a Magic Link
step.magicLink.disclaimer.subheading: Creating this Lootbox is easy because you are using a magic link that pre-fills several fields for you. Please use the pre-sets and customize the rest.
step.magicLink.disclaimer.subheading2: The following {numFields} fields have been pre-filled and cannot be edited:
step.magicLink.disclaimer.tooltip: Want to create your own Magic Link? Scroll all the way down past "Step 7. Terms & Conditions". Click the button labeled "Create Magic Link".
step.magicLink.disclaimer.tournament: You're part of a tournament! Visit the tournament page by clicking üëâ {link}.
step.terms.agreeEthics: I agree to conduct business ethically & professionally as a fiduciary to my investors and fellow gamers.
step.terms.invalidTreasuryWallet: Invalid Treasury Wallet, check if the address is compatible with {networkName}
step.terms.tos: I agree to the Lootbox Terms & Conditions and release Lootbox DAO from any liability as a permissionless protocol.
step.terms.verify: I have verified my Reputation address & Treasury wallet is correct
ticketCard.transferNFT.title: Transfer #{ticketId}
ticketCard.viewPayout.subHeader.noDivide: The gamer has not deposited any earnings yet. Come back later to claim your rewards.
tournament.edit.addStream.description: Tournament streams increase community engagement by allowing users to watch the tournament live, directly on the public tournament page. You can add a stream for your tournament by clicking the button below.
tournament.edit.addStream.title: Manage Streams
tournament.edit.analytics.description: Track how many referral bounties have been claimed by your community.
tournament.edit.analytics.title: Tournament Analytics
tournament.edit.bulkReferral.description: Generate a CSV filled with participation rewards. These are one-time invite links to redeem a lottery ticket. Give this link to any fan you want. Once claimed, this link cannot be used again. Only tournament admins can generate this link.
tournament.edit.bulkReferral.title: Bulk Participation Rewards
tournament.edit.createMagicLink.help: Magic Links help people sign up for your tournament by creating a special Lootbox with the settings you choose! {learnMoreHyperLink}
tournament.edit.createMagicLink.help.ste: 1) Create a magic link for this exact tournament by üëâ {hyperlink}
2) Update your tournament with the Magic Link by üëâ {hyperlink}
tournament.edit.editTournament.title: Edit your Lootbox Tournament
tournament.edit.noLootboxes.message: There are no Lootboxes associated to your tournament yet.
tournament.lootboxList.firstHere: Looks like your the first one here!
tournament.lootboxList.title: Teams in this Tournament
tournament.manage.addLiveStream.message1: Live Streams let people watch your tournament in real-time! {learnMoreHyperLink}
tournament.manage.addLiveStream.message2: Update your tournament with a Live Stream by üëâ {hyperlink}
userTickets.title: Redeem Profit Sharing NFTs
viralOnboarding.acceptGift.description: Claim this FREE ESports Lootbox Ticket to win cash on {tournamentDate}
viralOnboarding.addEmail.header: Where should we send your FREE ticket?
viralOnboarding.chooseLottery.descriptio: Each Ticket is a Team competing in a cash prize tournament. You only win money if your chosen team wins.
viralOnboarding.chooseLottery.heading: Choose Your FREE Lottery
viralOnboarding.qrcode.description: Scan QR Code to accept a FREE Fan Lootbox Ticket for an ESports Tournament.
viralOnboarding.screenshotAndShare: If you want more tickets, generate a QR code below, screenshot it, and share it with your friends üëá
viralOnboarding.selectLottery.descriptio: Join {nPeople} other people who each earn {lotteryPrize} if this team wins the tournament.
viralOnboarding.signup.email.consentData: By providing your email, you also agree to share your data with the event organizer who may email you for marketing purposes, according to our {privacyPolicy} and {termsOfService}. You can cancel this at any time.
viralOnboarding.signup.email.disclaimer: You will NOT receiving marketing emails, we only notify if you win
viralOnboarding.youHaveAlreadyAccepted: You have already accepted this referral.
viralOnboarding.youHaveAlreadyAcceptedIn: You can only accept an initial invite once. {boldText}
